name: Barbership
description:
Barbership A Game by Lumaceon and Skyswimsky Controls
  • WASD to Move
  • Click to fire
  • Q to swap weapons
  • Number keys to change ammunition
  • Shift to go fast

Terraform the planets according to their requests. Resources have different effects on the planet's stats. The less resources on a planet, the more adding one will change its stats. If you need to mine more resources, there's a solar system to the right.

Additional Credits:

Music by Audionautix.com
